[exhausted] God, I got the promotion. Senior partner, 那个有景观的转角办公室，全都拿到了。[bitter] Funny how that email came through, 就在Sarah发短信说要分手之后。其实就隔了20分钟。我是说，我为这个奋斗了多少年？8年吧？现在就是...感觉... [sigh] I keep staring at the nameplate they sent over. 那些金色的字母，看着真讽刺。

[laugh] You know what's crazy? 每个人都在恭喜我。"你一定很开心吧，"他们这么说。我就点头微笑，因为说实话，你怎么跟人解释，嗯...你现在睡在那个转角办公室里，因为回到空荡荡的公寓感觉更糟糕？

[sad] Mom called yesterday. 她特别骄傲。我没法告诉她Sarah把狗也带走了。我因为新加坡那个deal错过了Emma的演奏会。我弟弟也不回我电话了，因为我，呃...因为我放了他鸽子太多次。

[very sad] I used to think having it all meant the career, you know? 成功啊，认可啊，这些东西。但是凌晨2点坐在这里，看着这个愚蠢的名牌... [trailing off] 我不知道，也许有些胜利根本不值得去赢。

[regretful] Hmm. 我想我得到了所有我以为自己想要的东西。

original_conversation.content:
[exhausted] God, I got the promotion. Senior partner. The corner office with the view, the whole thing. [bitter] Funny how that email came through right after Sarah texted she was done. Twenty minutes apart, actually. I mean, I've been working toward this for, what, eight years? And now it's just... [sigh] I keep staring at the nameplate they sent over. All that gold lettering. 

[laugh] You know what's crazy? Everyone keeps congratulating me. "You must be so happy," they say. And I just nod and smile because, honestly, how do you explain that you're, um... that you're sleeping in that same corner office because going home to an empty apartment feels worse? 

[sad] Mom called yesterday. She was so proud. I couldn't tell her that Sarah took the dog. That I missed Emma's recital because of the Singapore deal. That my brother won't return my calls anymore because I, uh... because I canceled on him too many times. 

[very sad] I used to think having it all meant the career, you know? The success. The recognition. But sitting here at 2 AM with this stupid nameplate... [trailing off] I don't know, maybe some victories aren't worth winning. 

[regretful] Hmm. I guess I got everything I thought I wanted.

subject: Getting everything you wanted professionally while your personal life completely falls apart
